name: The Heated Long Wait
description:
[CONTROLS]:

WASD Movement

Q -Toggle your time information

P - Adjust game volume

Spacebar - Shoot projectiles when possible (Use your mouse to aim the projectiles)

[TIPS]

Clock values:

Regular white clock: Decreases time of waiting by 1/2.

Gold clock: Increases player walkspeed by 2.

Purple clock: Increases your month count by 2.

Green clock: Increases your days count by 10.

Blue clock: Increases your minutes by 30, hours by 6, days by 15, and month by 3.

[BACKGROUND]

This story takes place in a snowy landscape, where you have to spend an entire year surviving in the cold until you can finally be able to escape. But fret not! Time is on your side. Literally. Will that be the end of your journey though? Only time will tell...

[OTHER INFORMATION]

This game was made for Kindred Community Jam #5 with the theme: "The Fire Musn't Go Out" or "Penguin Party".

I may continue on this idea depending on if people enjoyed this. I'm overall proud of this game because I created all the programming, made all the art, and developed the music within 7 days! This is a big accomplishment for me thus far and I was really passionate about this idea.

Unity Font used:

Free Pixel Font: Thaleah - TinyWorlds
